thread.title: Hardly Strictly 2015 gets underway
thread.title_full: Hardly Strictly 2015 gets underway - San Francisco Chronicle

title: Hardly Strictly 2015 gets underway
locations: San Francisco Thousands of Bay Area
text:
Photo: Nathaniel Y. Downes, The Chronicle Thousands of Bay Area middle school students are entertained by Cirkus Quirkus and P.M.W. during the educational program at Hardly Strictly Bluegrass on Friday, Oct. 2, 2015 in San Francisco, Calif. San Francisco Thousands of Bay Area middle school students are entertained by...
For 15 years now, the Hardly Strictly Bluegrass Festival has given the gift of music to the people of San Francisco. The free three-day concert remains a no-frills affair, uncluttered by gourmet food trucks or corporate tents offering phone-charging lounges. Thousands of Bay Area middle school students are entertained by Cirkus Quirkus and P.M.W. during the educational program at Hardly Strictly Bluegrass on Friday, Oct. 2, 2015 in San Francisco, Calif.
